title: American neutral voice over... MALE PLS
snippet:
I need to get around 2 min voice over. Please send me your samples of the narration given below. Just few lines.

Script/VO
The Modern world needs enterprises that can bridge the need for quality and most
importantly the need to nurture. Greentech is one such enterprise that believes in quality
and understands the evermore need to nurture and develop in terms of people and in termsof process. We are proud to be the official business partners of Samsung and Lenovo mobile phones in Pakistan.

With a humble beginning in 2012, we started our journey from one city with just 25
employees and 85 dealers, we have steadily grown over the years

2012
2013
2014
2015
and today this partnership yields around 400 direct employees, a nationwide presence in
over 100 cities with more than 1000 dealers and offices in 6 major cities. Our corporate
client portfolio includes major Telcos, Multi nationals and Banks. Green Tech now holds the majority market share of Samsung mobiles in the territory. We are also the authorized
partners for Samsung official phone accessories.
We care for our consumers and therefore we have developed a reliable customer care
network with over 250 collection points and 17 service centers across the country.
With 90% of the employees between 25-35 age group, growing number of female
employees presently at 10% of the total greentech family and more than 50% of employees with a 5+ year’s experience, in the their respective domains. We are dedicated to deliver innovation and quality that helps penetrate new markets, regions and continue to enrich the connected experience.


Regards
